thread.title_full: James Hetfield: Skrillex Was Present At The 'S&M' Show, He's The Blonde Kid Trying To Stage-Dive! [News]

title: James Hetfield: Skrillex Was Present At The 'S&M' Show, He's The Blonde Kid Trying To Stage-Dive! [News]
text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 11 hours ago 9 James Hetfield shared a fun bit of trivia during a recent appearance on the WTF Podcast , revealing that dubstep star Skrillex was present at Metallica's " S&M " performance at the Berkeley Community Theatre back in April 1999.At the time, young Sonny John Moore was only 11 years old.Anyhow, Het noted: "A little side note/interesting thing: the artist Skrillex who is somewhat popular - he was in the audience at that gig."He's in the video; he's got blonde hair, he's the kid that's trying to stage dive! [Laughs] Stage-dive at the symphony!"If you're up for some Skrillex hunting, you can check out the whole show in the player below.
